title: Registration & Breakfast
description: Registration at entry gate and breakfast for participants.

title: Inauguration Ceremony
description: Official opening ceremony with keynote speakers.

title: Hackathon & Hardware Round 1
description: Hack.X coding begins and Build.X hardware elimination round.

description: Hack.X Round 2 continues and Build.X final hardware round.

title: Hardware Valedictory

title: Entry & Breakfast
description: Participant entry, breakfast, and system setup.

title: Hackathon Elimination Round
description: Hack.X Round 3 elimination. Top 12 teams selected.

description: Teams present ideas to judges. Think.X registration opens at 10:00 AM.

title: Games & Hackathon Final Round
description: BGMI & Free Fire games and Hack.X final coding round.

title: Final Valedictory & Results
description: Final results and winner announcements for all events.
